meanings.definition: A circular target used in the game of darts.
meanings.sent1: The dartboards at the pub were colorful and had different point values.
meanings.sent2: Players aim at the dartboards to score points in the game.
meanings.sent3: When the dart hit the dartboard, it made a satisfying thud.
meanings.sent4: The dartboard beckoned the players to test their accuracy like a challenging bullseye.
meanings.sent5: The dartboard's concentric circles made it easy to see where to aim.

meanings.definition: A board with numbered sections used for playing darts.
meanings.sent1: The dartboards in the game room were well-worn from many rounds of play.
meanings.sent2: Each player takes turns throwing darts at the dartboards to score points.
meanings.sent3: The dartboards seemed to mock the players with their elusive bullseye.
meanings.sent4: The dartboard stood as a symbol of precision and skill in the room.
meanings.sent5: The dartboards' numbers helped players keep track of their scores easily.
